lead_paragraph: Chris Bosh has almost certainly played his final game for Miami, with the All-Star forward's latest health setback convincing the Heat that his plan to play again is no longer feasible.

headline.print_headline: Pat Riley Says Chris Bosh Likely Played Last Game With Heat
headline.main: Pat Riley Says Chris Bosh Likely Played Last Game With Heat

snippet: Chris Bosh has almost certainly played his final game for Miami, with the All-Star forward's latest health setback convincing the Heat that his plan to play again is no longer feasible....
